extracted_information: The KCT Knowledge API v2.0.0 is a Fashion Intelligence Platform offering AI-powered recommendations and visual analysis. It provides various endpoints across different versions (v1, v2, v3, v4) for fashion intelligence, smart bundles, chat, voice, personalization, sales optimization, predictive analytics, and customer segmentation. Key areas relevant to the query include analytics, customer insights, chatbot interactions, and business intelligence capabilities.

v1.functionality_overview: Provides foundational endpoints for recommendations, user profiles, conversion tracking, general intelligence, and personalization relevant to customer insights and business intelligence.

v2.description: Advanced visual analysis and smart bundling

smart_bundles.functionality_overview: Offers analytics for smart bundles, providing insights into their performance.

intelligence.functionality_overview: Includes endpoints for psychological analysis, career trajectory tracking, venue optimization, cultural adaptation, and fabric performance, contributing to customer insights and business intelligence.

chat.functionality_overview: Full suite of chatbot interaction endpoints including conversation management and analytics for identifying chat patterns.

v4.description: Comprehensive personalization, sales optimization, and predictive analytics

personalization.functionality_overview: Provides deep customer personalization capabilities including profile management, recommendation generation, learning, and predictive modeling for customer insights.

sales_optimization.functionality_overview: Offers tools for optimizing sales through recommendations, dynamic pricing, bundle management, cross-selling, cart recovery, and general sales analytics.

predictive_analytics.functionality_overview: Dedicated endpoints for predictive analytics including general analysis, churn prediction, LTV calculation, purchase probability, next best action, and seasonal trends for deep business intelligence.

segmentation.functionality_overview: Enables customer segmentation, persona adaptation, and analysis for targeted marketing and customer insights.

integration.functionality_overview: Integrates customer intelligence data and provides an enhanced chat experience.
